job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Make your mark as a .NET software engineer with a focus on AI at Boskalis. In this challenging role you will be instrumental in building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services. You will work closely with other software engineers and AI specialists to integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications, ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated within our business applications and Microsoft environment. Next to that you will also be responsible for the maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date., * Design, develop, and maintain AI-enhanced .NET applications using Microsoft technologies.
     * Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications.
     * Ensure applications are scalable, secure, and compliant with best practices.
     * Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing.
     * Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks to continually enhance our offerings.
job_details.full_text:
NET Software Engineer (AI Focus)

Make your mark as a .NET software engineer with a focus on AI at Boskalis. In this challenging role you will be instrumental in building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services. You will work closely with other software engineers and AI specialists to integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications, ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated within our business applications and Microsoft environment. Next to that you will also be responsible for the maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date., * Design, develop, and maintain AI-enhanced .NET applications using Microsoft technologies.
     * Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications.
     * Ensure applications are scalable, secure, and compliant with best practices.
     * Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing.
     * Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks to continually enhance our offerings.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services, integrating AI models and algorithms into .NET applications, and ensuring scalability and efficiency. While it mentions .NET and Microsoft technologies, the core focus on integrating AI models and algorithms, along with responsibilities like code reviews, unit testing, and staying abreast of AI developments, aligns more closely with the 'ML Engineer' profile's emphasis on productionizing models and developing AI-driven systems, rather than the 'GenAI Engineer' profile which is more focused on generative models and LLM-specific frameworks.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design, develop, and maintain AI-enhanced .NET applications using Microsoft technologies' directly relates to building and maintaining software applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, and maintain AI-enhanced .NET applications using Microsoft technologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications' indicates the core task of incorporating machine learning models into software.
job_tasks.phrase: integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications

job_tasks.phrase: ensure they are scalable, efficient, and seamlessly integrated within our business applications and Microsoft environment

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'responsible for the maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date' implies ongoing operational responsibility for deployed software.
job_tasks.phrase: responsible for the maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications' highlights the interaction with and integration of AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Ensure applications are scalable, secure, and compliant with best practices' relates to the development and maintenance of robust software.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensure applications are scalable, secure, and compliant with best practices

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing' are standard practices in software development and MLOps for ensuring quality and maintainability.
job_tasks.phrase: Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks to continually enhance our offerings' implies a need to understand and potentially adapt data processing and model training pipelines.
job_tasks.phrase: Stay abreast of developments in AI technologies and .NET frameworks to continually enhance our offerings
